description: This file contains unit tests for the TodoService class in a Java backend application. It uses JUnit 5 and Mockito to mock dependencies and verify behavior of CRUD operations on Todo entities.

classes.name: TodoServiceTest
classes.description: JUnit test class for TodoService, testing CRUD operations, list filtering, and toggle completion functionality.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mock repository and service before each test.

methods.name: create_shouldPersistWithDefaults
methods.description: Tests that creating a Todo via service persists the entity with default and provided values.

methods.name: list_shouldDelegateToRepositoryWithNormalizedQuery
methods.description: Tests that listing Todo items delegates to repository with normalized query parameters.

methods.name: getById_whenMissing_shouldThrowNotFound
methods.description: Ensures that requesting a non-existent Todo throws NotFoundException.

methods.name: update_put_requiresTitleAndOverwritesAll
methods.description: Tests full update (PUT) overwrites all fields and requires a title.

methods.name: update_put_missingTitle_shouldThrowIllegalArgument
methods.description: Verifies that missing title in a PUT update throws an exception.

methods.name: update_patch_shouldOnlyApplyProvidedFields
methods.description: Tests partial update (PATCH) only modifies provided fields.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldFlipAndPersist
methods.description: Tests toggling completion status of a Todo flips the boolean and persists.

methods.name: delete_missing_shouldThrowNotFound
methods.description: Verifies that deleting a non-existent Todo throws NotFoundException.

methods.name: delete_existing_shouldDelete
methods.description: Tests that existing Todo is deleted successfully.
